thread.title: Lori ~ who loves candy ...
thread.title_full: CandyWarehouse.com reviewed by Lori ~ who loves candy ...

author: Lori ~ who loves candy ...
title: Lori ~ who loves candy ...
text: Your site is amazing .~ I was searching for a certain candy that my husband and I enjoyed , but its so hard to find .. but you guys had it ., and the customer service was awesome !!! friendly , accurate , and super fast shipping with delicious quality .. it was a great gift to my hubby , who was so surprised to see them.. thanks so much !!!! and I recommend your company to everyone ..
